Table 1. Anomaly detection: mean AUC results on MNIST, CI-
FAR10 and Fashion MNIST. The results are split into scratch with-
out any pre-training, KD or pretrained with Imagenet and self-
supervised learning (SSL). Bold numbers represent the best result 
(within 0.5%) for each data set, discriminated by scratch, SSL or 
Imagenet.

Table 2. Anomaly detection: mean accuracy and AUC on MVTec AD produced by the SOTA and our method. Best result in red and
